definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. [[חרר]] (√ of foll.; Ar. h.ar=a be or become free, h.ur=un free, freeborn; NH [[חרר]] Pi. set free, [[חׂר]] freeman; Aram. [[חֲרַר]], h.ar Pa. set free, [[חׂרָא]], [[חָרְתָּא]] freed-man, -woman; Sab. [[חר]] freeman, noble (?) DHM:Epigr.Denkm. 57; Eth. h.ari: coll. army, troops (in Amhar. free, noble, acc. to Di:85), h.ariwi: free, noble, etc.)
